description:
An intelligent AI office tool

OfficeAI Assistant is a free intelligent AI office tool for Microsoft Office and WPS. Whether you want to know “how to enter a check mark”, “how to add text before inserting a table”, or “which formula to use”, AI Office Assistant can always provide you with fast and accurate solutions. Through simple instructions, ExcelAI plugins can help you automatically complete complex formula calculations and choose functions. WordAI plugin can also help you organize weekly reports, write meeting key points, summarize content, and improve writing. All in all, OfficeAI Assistant will greatly improve your working efficiency and make your daily work easier and more convenient.
source: 珠海海鹦安全科技有限公司
